ns2:test-suite.name: General Bank POSITIVE flow

test-case.name: Verify if user receives answer on "Account balance" message
test-case.title: Verify if user receives answer on "Account balance" message

step.name: Given User select General Bank Demo tenant
step.title: Given User select General Bank Demo tenant

step.name: When User enter Account balance into widget input field
step.title: When User enter Account balance into widget input field

step.name: Then User have to receive 'Hi [FIRST_NAME], checking your balance on your phone is easy. You'll need to download and register the General bank app. Then, select save, sign in and voila, you'll be able to see your balances.' text response for his 'Account balance' input
